name: Red.exe (Remake)
description:
This is a remake of Red.exe, an old game made by a person with the nickname of "DAL-GAMES"  in 2015 circa, but he removed it some time later and the game for now is lost.

It's my second Pokemon creepy game, and i decided to do it about this lost game because i always liked this idea, that is a really original one!

Plot:

"Professor Oak comes to Lavender Town to find Red and to try to stop him once and for all , because he did really horrible things to people and Pokemon since he started his adventure.

Will Professor Oak be able to survive  the wrath of Red?"

I used some old textures from the original ones from the original game, but i put also some things to show it's a my game, like the style, mechanisms, textures, etc..., like in my first game! :)

And i really hope you like it! :D

I did this remake just for fun and because the original one was lost, i liked the idea and i wanted it back somehow, and that's it, hahah

(Also in the chasing part i put some invisible walls to not make you bug Red, haha, because i don't know to make a good following enemy event, also, in this engine program i don't even think is possible, but yeah, i told it so you will know it when you will play it!)
